front_image_url.description: An image (supplied via URL or Base64) that represents the front view of the object.

left_image_url.description: An image (supplied via URL or Base64) that represents the left-side view of the object.

back_image_url.description: An image (supplied via URL or Base64) that represents the back view of the object.

right_image_url.description: An image (supplied via URL or Base64) that represents the right-side view of the object.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

b64_json.description: The base64-encoded JSON of the generated image.

credits_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
POST /v1/images/generations HTTP/1.1
Host: api.aimlapi.com
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: */*

{
  "model": "magic/image-to-3d",
  "front_image_url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aimlapi/api-docs/main/reference-files/t-rex.png"
}
